definition[1]: certain to happen or to be achieved
definition[2]: the person or organization that will receive the money from an assurance agreement, or the person whose life is covered by the agreement
example[2]: A policy is of no effect until the certificate is delivered to the assured.
definition[3]: something that you can rely on to be available
example[3]: Joeâ€™s assured income persuaded the bank to lend him the money.
example[4]: Plentiful raw materials and assured markets had improved living standards.
